documents.document: Nice vacations in Natura The BEACH, really good, hotter than the pool which is a little slow but it good to swin and have a drink!Second the food increase day after day, in the end it was quiet excellent, the media luna restaurant is pretty awesome, great meat and ambient!The rooms are good but could be a bit bigger, i have stay in bigger, maybe more expensive!In conclusion, it worth every penny! i recommend it!the animation its SUPERB!!!
